name: PhysicalActivityLevelDevice
title: Physical Activity Level,  Device
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing an observation of physical activity level measured by a device.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify the person's level of physical activity as identified by a device (e.g., fitbit, apple watch, etc).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Physical Activity Level  as measured by a Device.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Physical Activity Level as measured by a Device.)
